title: Shiseido
summary: Shiseido Company, Limited (Japanese: 株式会社資生堂, Hepburn: Kabushiki-gaisha Shiseidō, pronounced [ɕiseꜜːdoː]) is a Japanese multinational cosmetic company. Its product categories consist of: skin care, makeup, body care, hair care and fragrances. It is one of the oldest cosmetic companies in the world. Founded in 1872, the company celebrated its 140th anniversary in 2012.[5][6] It is the largest cosmetic firm in Japan and the fifth largest cosmetic company in the world.[7] In Japan, Shiseido is available at cosmetic counters at selected department stores and most pharmacies (also known as "drug stores" in Japan). The company owns numerous brands and subsidiaries worldwide, in addition to its founding label. The company is headquartered in Tokyo, and is traded on the Tokyo Stock Exchange.
